content.description: Sit start the steep egg, and traverse right to top out. The beta is tricky.
content.location: Park at Redrock, cross the street, head into the woods, get on the trail to Dyke's Pond, and take the first trail on your left that goes uphill. The boulder is on the right at the top of the hill.
This is on the left side of the trail 50 feet off the trail.

content.description:
Stand start the prow, throw a heel up, and figure out how to make it the rest of the way. It is right of the problem Pendulum. 

  This was named for the beached whale move I used to get up, plus I broke my phone screen doing it.
content.protection: There is a good landing - use a pad.
content.location:
From New Way Lane parking lot, head back down the road towards Route 133 for ~1/8 mile, and take the trail left into the woods directly across from "Song Bird Farm". Follow this trail to an open airsoft battlefield area, this boulder is at the far side before you head down the hill - you can't miss it. 

  OR - park at Redrock, cross the street, head into the woods, get on the trail to Dyke's Pond, and take the first trail on your left that goes uphill. The boulder is on the right at the top of the hill.

content.description: These are two smaller blocks worth checking out.
